projects.description: Application with animations, adaptive layout, list of phones, tablets and accessories, sliders, pagination, filtering, sorting, routing, authorization, dark and white themes and other interesting features.
One-page adaptive landing page with a mobile menu, smooth animations, various sections, blocks, and cards.

A well-styled task manager with the ability to add, delete, mark tasks as completed, switch between completed and active tasks, mark all as completed, and delete all completed tasks. The application also operates using an API where all tasks are stored.
One-page adaptive landing page with a mobile menu, various sections, blocks, and cards. There are also two different sliders and pagination here.
One-page adaptive landing page with a slider and various blocks with different types of animation.
An application with banners slider, a favorites page, and cards slider, data for which retrieved from the Space-X API.

An application with the ability to sort individuals by name, gender, birth, and death dates, providing the option to find the mother and father of each person and allowing filtering by male, female, and birth years.
Simple landing page with header, navigation, cards section and footer.
This is a user-friendly application where you can view a list of users, sort them by username, filter by name, username, or email, and browse through the posts and comments of each user.
